sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2184000
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Classical Cas9 endonuclease for knock-out of target genes
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableProvenance: The Classical cas9 come from E.COLI
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription:
1. The basic assumption of the project is based on the fact that there is a direct link between particular taste affection and the number of receptors for that taste. For this reason, the ability to control the polymorphism of taste receptors may be useful in many ways to human society, for example, specific desirable diet aid by reducing the ability to feel a specific unhealthy taste, reducing alcohol consumption by changing sensitivity to alcohol, reducing the risk of high blood pressure by eliminating the need for salt taste, changing the sensitivity for bitterness to allow swallowing a pill for the purpose of providing medical care and more.
2. Guide RNA is a hundred base-long molecule with a unique two dimensional structure which binds Cas9 and guides it to a dsDNA sequence complementary to 21-22 base pairs on the 5' end of the molecule. 3. This part will used negative control of our Experiment.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableNotes: This part will used as negative control. for that cause This sequence is not-specific for our tested DNA. therefore not occur as a cutting reaction.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Margalit Mualem

prov:Activity.dcterms:title: iGEM to SBOL conversion
prov:Activity.dcterms:description: Conversion of the iGEM parts registry to SBOL2.1
